alert.note: Alert for Gallatin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 13 at 11:54AM MDT until June 16 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Montana... Gallatin River at Logan affecting Gallatin County. Gallatin River near DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway affecting Gallatin County. .Heavy rain falling on a melting snowpack is causing rising river levels. For the Gallatin River...including DCP-Gallatin R/Gateway, Logan... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gallatin River at Logan. * WHEN...Until late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.9 feet, water into USGS gage house. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM MDT Sunday, June 12 the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate above flood stage with a maximum value of 10.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.6 feet on 01/29/1975. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Tuesday morning.Tuesday morning at 1000 AM MDT.
